text: 18 pahala – senanayaka jathika pasala, madampe samaga dhammissara jathika pasala, naththandiya

aanduwa yuddhaya anaganu atha yi da, samaharawita yuddhayata erehiwa jathyanthara madihathwimak athiwi ee nisa ikman aandu peraliyak athi kirimata hethuwanu atha yi da wishwasa karamin dadi yuda wirodhi pa්rathipaththiyak wetha thallu wiya.eyin penenne siduwemin thibunu yuddhaya gana hari thakseruwak ejapayata nothibunu bawaya.

swamini eya ese wuwada daruwage jiwithaya ema wedanawata wada watina nisa daruwa kere aadarayen ese karami.
ee gana danatamath janadhipathiwaraya saha agramathyawaraya ekangathwayakata pathwa sitina bawa agramathya karyala aaranchi marga wartha karana bawada pawase.

emanisa nihathamaniwa uthsahaya thulin oba adhyapana katayuthu kalahoth obata anunata eershya karanna awashya wenne naha.
hitapu hamudapathi mahesh senanayaka janadhipathiwaranayata!
pera gediya wate ee hama adila thiyenawa.
aya ekawara bandunata athulu wuwahoth - karadara nowanna.

thuthi bohoma, wenas kala.

pasal nila andum sandaha awashya wana redi pramanayen kotasak chinayen aanayanaya kirimata piyawara gena athi bawin eewa da kadinamin bedaharima sandaha katayuthu karana bawa adhyapana amathyanshaya pawasayi.
labha, kirthi, prashansa apekshawen thorawa siwu pirisidu silayehi pihita wiryayen yuthuwa ee ee bhikshun wahansela purana piliweth anuwa atham pirisak arahath palaya sakshath karathi.

mokada eya kiwwe?”
habayi ee sancharaka wyaparaya sandaha.
eeth samaharu mata wirudda weyi.
eeth mehema karapu eka hondayi..
palli, pansal madi wi anatha wuwanta sarana wimata ki්raya kirimen dharmika bawa pennum kirimda ewanima wyajayaki.

api asarana wela wage hithata danenawa, budu hamuduruwane.

meka dakala mamath athithayata giya sanekin..

samastha lanka kawi sammelanaye pradhana lekam saha esape palath sabha manthri dayarathna ranepurata ghathanaya kirima sandaha wedi thabuwada diwi galawa ganimata ohu samathwuwada barapathala thuwala siduwiya.
nishpadanaya ha adhyakshanaya nam rajapaksha samagame bawa apata hitha gatha haki ya.
mokada udaharana tika man athin dapuwa.
enam wiganakadhipathi gamini wijesinha mahatha da thahawuru kara athi aakarayata shri lankawa ithihasaya thula labagena athi dawanthama naya pramanaya labagena aththe pasugiya dashakaya thula di ya.
mal pani tikak, wadiya newi tikak aran ooka amathaka karala dapan.
saubhagyaye saha balaye bediyama, thiringu saha gawayanta pamanak laghu kota dakwiya hakida ?
ethakota ee nambar eka lankawata awillath naha.
matath oya pare yanna aasawa thiyenne umbaa kiwwa nadegurage post eka dakapu dawase idala...
ehema nam gihillama balannako me link ekata..........
me wahana nathi awadhiyayedi minisa ta ratak kotharam wishalawa danennata athda.
ee nisa niwtan mahaththayata ara wage sin ekak bala ganna dawas deka thuna balan inna wenawa.

rawana aithihasika charithayak nowana bawa kiyana ithihasagnyayan ha purawidyagnyayan atharata ekathuwimata kamaththak dakwana lalindra sannasgama namathi lekhakaya nagi sitina durwala padanama ohuta awabodha karawana atharama sudda anuwa giya ithihasaya hadarannanda dana gathayuthu karunu bohoya.
eya therum ganimata arbudayata madiwi sitina katawath apahasu natha.
gediwalin karana mala sandaha yodaganne dehiya.
je nam amerikankaraya shri lankawata pamina aththe parisaraya pilibanda wyapruthiyak nima kirimata ya.
dahawal nida ganima kotharam musalada yayi hagune kama awasan kara nawatha adata pamini witayi..
enam kristhiyani aagama saha muslim aagama atharayi.
kese wuwa da mei pruthuwiye godabima daka dakath maha muhude jiwathwana ekama minis samajaya eyayi.

katti panimin siti wele suda 2014 nowambar masayedi pakisthanaye ayi.es. ayi. rahas oththu sewawa mangin athadanguwata gena 2015 janawari masayedi merata polisiye aparadha parikshana departhamenthuwata bara dena ladi.
ee nisa hatharen pasu api mura katayuthu gana echchara salakilimath une naha.

sammanalabhin dewana waratath ohu athin film feyar sammana laba ganimin sathuta bhukthi winda atha.
namuth eewaye rahasyabhawaya nathiwigos thibena bawin, dan yodaganne naha.
"kasippu" yana wachanaya ahala athda ?
mama me thula kupitha wenna oona na., gatenna oone na patalenna oona na.
oba ese nokala bawa upakalpanayakaramin ma kiyannata yanne me manushya swabhawaya bawayi.

samiyage wikrutha kamashawan pilibanda aya usawiya danuwath kala pasuwa siddhiya sambandha parikshana pawathwana niladharin samiya sathu pariganaka ha pariganaka upanga pilibanda pashchath dijital parikshanayak sidu kala athara ehidi siddhiyawu juni 24 wanada ratha්ri kalaye wipien paddhathiya osse rahasigathawa paya thunakata aasanna kalayak warin wara pariganakayata sambandhawi thibuna aakaraya saka katayuthuwu bawin ee gana soya balimedi waidya dinendra kisiyam fayil wagayak pudgalika gonuwata thanpathkara athi bawa parikshakawarun anawaranaya kala.
amma warma nonata kochchara kamathida?
muthrashaye gal athi wanne muthrawala sanghatakawala thibena wenaskam, panaya karana jalaye thibena wenaskam, saha shariraye lawanawala thibena wenaskam hethuweni.
sayindumardu pasukara enawita inpasu apita ampara - madakalapuwa mayimata ena kalmune nagaraya munagasenawa.
ee nisa siyalu sanwidhayakayanta upades denna me sandaha unanduwen katayuthu karanna kiyala.

ee nisa "dayawansha jayakodi" mahaththayo, obathumata thalash balanna puluwan eke irida paththarayakata wicharayak karanna issella dan wath me chithrapatiya gihin narambaala karana wicharayak karanna.
udangu bawa ha kukusbawa duru karayi.
owunge ee manasikathwayata mul wu hethu sadhaka gana mama adahas palakaranawa, boho wita wiwechanayan thulin.
anith ewunuth ful mud eke wage innawa.
ee thula thamage katayuthu lehesiyen da pahasuwen da itukara gatha haka.
kalak thama kamaththen newasikawa thabagath bhikshuwak nerapimata hakiwanne winaya wirodhi charyawan ha sadharana hethu adhikaranayata idiripath kirimeni.

saukhya amathya rajitha senarathna, niyojya amathya fayasal kasim, saukhya amathyanshaye lekam janaka sugathadasa, saukhya adhyaksha janaral waidya anil jayasinha, polonnaruwa maha rohale adhyaksha waidya indika sampath kumara yana mahathwarun da shi්ra lankawe china thanapathi yi shiyanlin mahatha athulu sambhawaniya aaradhitha pirisak mema awasthawata ekwa sitiyaha.
indiya supiri nili shri dewi miyagos aththe nana kamaraya thula siduwu anathurakin bawata wides madhya wartha kara thibenawa.
me pilibanda danumdemin janadhipathiwarayata lipiyak yomukala bawada liyanage mahatha "mawbima"ta pawasiya.
eekata hethuwa mama bauddha pasubimakin pawatha ena kenek wima mulikawama, mage siya game pansale pradhana dayakaya.
ohu wiparamin gamankaranu daka ayek pamina 'aa dokta dan godak welada awith me ape mama kenekge geyak" ayi dokta kawuruth ekka awith maga arunada?
nepalaye sitina bodhisathwaya chinaye ‘‘chinglish’’ thahanam kala se shri lankawe “singlish” thahanam kala yuthuya »
bhauthawedaya  waidya widyawa sandaha nobel thagga himi wa aththeth eka indiyanuwakuta pamanayi
niladhariya asungena sitiye mrudu diwanayakaya.
eeye pawathi janahamuwakadi agramathya di.mu.jayarathna mahatha me bawa pawasiya.
pirisa waha aath wemin ayata ida dunnoya.
amathiwaraya ee sambandhayen dadi sthawarayaka sitina bawa da ohu kiya sitiyeya.

mage amma mata siyalla dila yanda giyaprawina jana kalakaru rohana baddagesaba gayanawa kati kara gath mewani jana gi asurin nirmana bohomayak kala prawina janakalakaru rohana baddage aththatama awyaja gamiyeki.

me alla panalle ayahapath aarthika kalamanakaranaya ha simanthika dushana nisa rate aarthikaya da pirihi, jiwana wiyadama dara gatha no haki tharamata ihala gos thibe.

mema pudgalaya pereda (24 wanida) ganithapura kadawalata gos alewi kirimata thaba thibu bhanda atharin atham bhanda paribhogikayata wikinima sandaha sudusu nathi bawa prakasha karamin meya adhikaranayata idiripath kalahoth wishala dada mudalak gewimata siduwana bawa pawasa atha.
ese kirimen budu wima no wa niwana da kal yanu atha.
kunu kandak yata sangawa giya ithiyopiyanu jiwitha 48
mehidi oba kelinma pahatha thirayata paminenu athi.
parani yodha ala gaman kala, danata sindi athi kotaswala goda gowithan kirima, bamma kapa niwes thanima, iwuru kapa gadol thanima siduwe.
api me seroma tika uuru kotuwa wate hadapu gal pilima wage balagena hitiya.

rajakariye yedi sitina athara daru prasuthiya sidukala athalossak loka nayakayan atharata nawasilantha agamathi jasinda aadanda ekathu wuwaya. 2017 wasaredi oostreliyanu senetwariyaka wana larisa wotars fedaral parlimenthuwe rajakari atharawaraye di siya bilindata kiri dimen mema nawa ralla aarambha wiya.
kalayak gatha wimedi naya gewimatath naya ganimata wanawa neda?

sanwadayak aarambha kirimata pera liyapadinchi wima pahasukamak nowana athara, oba mayikrofonayakata saha web kamarawakata prawesha wimata ida nodenne nam, obata mema web adawiyen iwath wimata siduwe.

eyata pera bandaranayaka, chelwanayagam, dangli chelwanayagam giwisum dekama sakachcha karala athsan kala wunata eya parlimenthuwe sammatha wune na.

meya batayak thula wani tharala p rawahayak gaman ganna margaye thabayi.
me idiripath wela inna aya, hadawatha ugullala dunna wage parithyagayan kala.
